channel.title: Need Help with Orbs
channel.description:
I've added 2007 runescape loading orbs for hp and prayer but it still doesn't appear.
I used this tut, http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/544409-2007-oldschool-runescape-orbs.html

item.title: Need Help with Orbs
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you only copy-pasted the code from the Snippet (it’s a snippet not a tutorial) it’s no wonder it isn’t working.
All he did was give you the methods, you actually have to use them.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with Orbs
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

joeyscape:

Just don’t reply to my post im not going to argue with you… you’re a idiot…

Only trying to help you brother, you won’t be getting any help on this thread at all so, you might want to consider counting your blessings and start trying to figure it out on your own, everyone here with a brain will agree with me. Good day, and good luck. May your frustrations be calmed, and you will see the light.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with Orbs
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“joeyscape, post:3, topic:547848”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=666753.msg4458090#msg4458090 date=1416069811]
Asking your question better would be helpful, post pictures and code from your client in its current state, to help us visually see what isn’t working the way it should, along with the code in it’s current state, etc. etc.
[/quote]

Not trying to be smart ass but it’s pretty obvious what I need help with and it’s only 1 code which I added from the tut. And you want me to take a picture of my client where the orbs aren’t showing when I stated that the orbs aren’t appearing there’s nothing to really to take a screenshot of…[/quote]
Actually there is, you can’t expect us to magically help you if there’s nothing to work with. “My orbs aren’t working” isn’t going to get you anywhere, why do you think I haven’t tried to help? I won’t sit here and ask you “Did you do this…” all day, because you could easily explain this in the OP and avoid all that jibber jabber.

Read full topic
